moves.name: Rush
moves.desc: Charge at an enemy for 1 base damage.

moves.name: Space Out
moves.desc: Space out in the middle of battle. Oops.

moves.name: Buff Up
moves.desc: Enlargen your muscles to slightly raise strength.

moves.name: Brace Self
moves.desc: Brace for incoming damage, slightly raising defense.

moves.name: Hasten
moves.desc: Quicken your movements and slightly increase speed.

moves.name: Vampiric Chomp
moves.desc: Bite the foe for 2 base damage and drain 2 of their health.

moves.name: Reckless Charge
moves.desc: Charge the foe for 4 base damage, but sacrifice defense slightly.

moves.name: Flame Breath
moves.desc: Spew flames for 3 base damage, and inflict burn.

moves.name: Aqua Jet
moves.desc: Blast the foe with pressurized water for 3 base damage, and inflict slow.

moves.name: Toxic Spores
moves.desc: Spread toxic spores throughout the air, inflicting poison.
